remarks: Transfer the subspace sum of a closed subspace and an atom back to lattice join.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2015.)
statement:
dihjat6.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjat6.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjat6.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat6.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat6.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjat6.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dihjat6.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjat6.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihjat6.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
dihjat6 $p |- ( ph -> ( `' I ` ( X .(+) Q ) ) = ( ( `' I ` X ) .\/ ( `' I ` Q ) ) ) $.
